data.comment: The match has started at Ashton Gate.
Goal! Chris Martin heads Bristol City into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Ashton Gate.
Adrian Mariappa is replacing Zak Vyner for Bristol City at Ashton Gate.
In the minute 64, Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's first substitution at Ashton Gate with Anis Mehmeti replacing Fred Onyedinma.
Goal! Garath McCleary levels the match at 1-1.
The home team replace Nahki Wells with Famara Diedhiou.
In the minute 77, Bristol City make their third substitution with Opi Edwards replacing Callum O'Dowda.
Dennis Adeniran is on a sub for Curtis Thompson for Wycombe.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Famara Diedhiou.
In the minute 89, Joe Jacobson (Wycombe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has come to a close in Bristol. The final score is 2-1.
Dennis Adeniran is booked for the away team.
